name: cauda-backed

scripts.dev: yarn generate && yarn codegen && yarn run-server

description: This example shows how to implement an **GraphQL server (SDL-first) with TypeScript** based on [Prisma Client](https://github.com/prisma/prisma2/blob/master/docs/prisma-client-js/api.md), [graphql-yoga](https://github.com/prisma/graphql-yoga) and [graphql-tools](https://www.apollographql.com/docs/graphql-tools/). It is based on a SQLite database, you can find the database file with some dummy data at [`./prisma/dev.db`](./prisma/dev.db).
